data.text: @sabuhtoothalex @TaleSpun @_MoonlightP Is a class VIII reunion in the works? God, I am so down with that
@TaleSpun @_MoonlightP @Shock_and_Roll Still waiting on Amazon to ship it but yeah should hopefully have it tomorrow. ready for these HD towns.
@_MoonlightP Yessssss. I think @sabuhtoothalex is getting it too and maybe @Shock_and_Roll as well? Wipe the dust off the LINE chat boys we are BACK
@TaleSpun think i'm gonna pick it up myself tomorrow. have a couple things left i'm still willing to trade in for it

@tyrantraveomega Yeah, I can understand that. It’s great combat and you can clearly do a lot of beat stuff with it, but it just doesn’t have the plot hooks for me to really send it over the top. DQXI seems like a meal at your favorite restaurant.

@TaleSpun I really dig it, but it's pretty damn demanding at times. I certainly appreciate the depth and flexibility of the combat but not quite in the mood for that kind of experience right now. DQ's always dependable though, should be a great time
@tyrantraveomega Yeah, Octopath is a solid game, but I bounced on it pretty quickly, sad to say. This looks like it’s going to scratch the JRPG itch in a BIG way. I’m hyped.
@TaleSpun can't wait! i liked what i played of octopath (i really need to play more), but i'm looking forward to something a little more relaxing lol
